page.title: 08AGRIC'L SERVICES IN HENLLAN
page.content: Henllan has three agricultural firms _ 1)Welsh Quality Lambs Ltd.is an aba- ttoir. 2000 cattle, 18000 pigs and 70000 sheep from all over Wales are slaughtered there each year.The meat is sold to wholesalers and retailers throughout N.Wales,N.W.England and the West Midlands. W.Q.L.has experienced two problems: -a narrow access road from the village -complaints about noise/smell ( which are being addressed ). W.Q.L.has branches in Wrexham,Builth and Craven Arms. _ 2)E.C.Evans(1979)Ltd,founded in 1947 was re-formed in 1979 after a firm it sold out to went into liquidation.The company sells/repairs farm machinery throughout North Wales. _ 3)Interchange Precision Parts offers a similar service to E.C.Evans.
